long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Telegram Saver - Download Telegram Video is a powerful tool designed specifically for Telegram users, aiming to simplify the process of downloading audio, video, and images from Telegram. Whether you need to save personal collections or conduct academic research, this plugin can meet your needs. Please note that we strongly advise users not to download copyrighted content without permission.

ğŸš€ Key Features
Batch Download
Supports one-click multi-selection batch download, allowing you to easily acquire multiple files.

Multiple Format Support
Supports downloading various media formats including videos, images, GIFs, music, and audiobooks.

Restricted Content Download
Easily download audio and video files from restricted channels and groups.

Private Content Saving
Safely save audio and video from private channels and personal shares.

No Additional Information Required
No need to enter passwords or APIs, simplifying the download process.

24/7 Support
Provides 24/7 technical support to ensure a smooth user experience.

Large Capacity Download
Supports downloading files larger than 1GB.

Full Compatibility
Compatible with Telegram's A and K versions, applicable to all channels and groups.

Quick Start Guide
Install the Extension
Install the TG Saver extension in your Chrome browser.

Pin the Extension
In the top-right corner of your browser, click the "Extensions" button, find TG Saver, and click the "Pin" icon to fix it to the toolbar.

Access Telegram Web Version
Open Telegram Web: https://web.telegram.org/k or https://web.telegram.org/a.

Batch Download Dialog Content
Browse the dialogs of channels or groups, the plugin icon will show the number of fetched resources. Click the icon, select the content for batch download.

Batch Download Group Information Content
Enter the channel or group, click the "Download All Media" or "Download Media This Month" button to quickly get all media files.

Single File Download
In the dialog, click the "Download" button below each file to download individual files.

ğŸ“œ Disclaimer
This plugin is independently developed and is not affiliated with the official Telegram app or website. Please ensure compliance with relevant laws and regulations before use, respecting copyright and using the tool within legal limits.
